entry.tran: (基督教遵循约翰·卫斯理教义的)循道宗信徒,循道公会教徒
entry.def: Methodists are Christians who follow the teachings of John Wesley and who have their own branch of the Christian church and their own form of worship.

means.word_mean: 1. a follower of Wesleyanism as practiced by the Methodist Church
1. of or pertaining to or characteristic of the branch of Protestantism adhering to the views of Wesley;
